column5: just curious... can you install marine data/maps into the portable GPS units used for the car?? are GPS  downloads manufacturer specific?

can you install marine data/maps into the portable GPS units used for the car??..maybe.....some can you would need to go to there  website and check   are GPS downloads manufacturer specific?...yes...........

I know that Lowrance has one that has the turn by turn map loaded but you can also put Navionics maps in it.  It's the XOG  by Lowrance ,  very inexpensive also.  I think I saw it somewhere for $299.00 http://www.lowrance.com/Products/Automotive/XOG/
